dnsPrefetchUrls.description: Provide URLs which the browser can resolved as quickly as possible before the resources are requested to improve loading performance.

maintenanceMode.description: Displays a maintenance page to enable retail proxy update

enableBingMapGeoLoation.description: Enable store detection based on user's ip address

enableClientRenderOptimization.friendlyName: Enables client side render performance optimizations
enableClientRenderOptimization.description: If enabled, client will render/hydrate before running the client side data actions. This will increase the initial page render performance on client and any client side requests will happen after the page is complete.

disableServerSideErrorChecking.description: If disabled, the server will not check for any errors when generating the HTML for the page. While this does increase page performance, any erros in will be surfaced up and will not be caught.

disableCookieCompliance.description: Configuration value to disable/enable cookie compliance across the site. If checked, site users will not have to consent to cookie usage.

cartSessionExpiration.description: Number of days before a cart will expire. If not set Cart will expire once browser is closed

maxDepth.description: The maximum number of data actions that can be called on a server per request

pageTitlePrefix.description: Specifies a prefix to append to the page title for all pages using page-summary modules

pageTitleSuffix.description: Specifies a suffix to append to the page title for all pages using page-summary modules

skipToMainText.description: Text to be displayed on the Skip To Main content link

enableCustomerAccountPayment.description: This setting determines if B2B and/or B2C customers can make payments with their customer account

enableDefaultOrderQuantityLimits.description: This setting determines if order quantity limits are applied to B2B and/or B2C customers orders

parameterizedUrlPaths.description: When a parameterized URL path is entered here, the last segment of a request URL containing that path will be interpreted as a parameter instead of a page. Learn more at https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?linkid=2150108.

disableContentSecurityPolicy.description: Controls whether content security policy should be disabled or enabled on your site

enableReportOnlyMode.description: If enabled, content security policy will not be enforced, but any violations will be reported to URI's specified by the report-uri directive.

enableNonce.description: Enabling nonce (number used once) will block the execution of all inline scripts except those specified within the inline script module.

report-uri.description: If a URI(s) are specified, the browser will POST CSP violation reports here. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Content-Security-Policy/report-uri for more details.

child-src.description: Allows extension of the child-src directive. The child-src directive governs the creation of nested browsing contexts as well as Worker execution contexts.

connect-src.description: Allows extension of the connect-src directive. The connect-src directive restricts which URLs the protected resource can load using script interfaces.

font-src.description: Allows extension of the font-src directive. The font-src directive restricts from where the protected resource can load fonts.

frame-ancestors.description: Allows extension of the frame-ancestors directive. This directive specifies valid parents that may embed a page using <frame>, <iframe>, <object>, <embed>, or <applet>.

frame-src.description: Allows extension of the frame-src directive. This directive specifies valid sources for nested browsing contexts loading using elements such as <frame> and <iframe>.

img-src.description: Allows extension of the img-src directive. The img-src directive restricts from where the protected resource can load images.

media-src.description: Allows extension of the media-src directive. The media-src directive restricts from where the protected resource can load video, audio, and associated text tracks.

object-src.description: Allows extension of the object-src directive. The object-src directive restricts from where the protected resource can load plugins.

script-src.description: Allows extension of the script-src directive. The script-src directive restricts which scripts the protected resource can execute. The directive also controls other resources, such as XSLT style sheets [XSLT], which can cause the user agent to execute script.

style-src.description: Allows extension of the style-src directive. The style-src directive restricts which styles the user may applies to the protected resource.

rnrPrivacyPolicy.description: Privacy policy for ratings and reviews
